resources.string:
Dear user, 

		welcome to The Shoe Store. Shoes are here for some time and since the time of wooden sandals has passed some time, there are genuinely hundreds of brands and thousands of different models of shoes. We took the task up on ourselves to provide a tool that would help small companies or even passionate shoe collectors to get organized. Enjoy the app and feel free to give us 5 star rating. 

\ Your Shoe Store

This applications provides to views for managing your shoes in just 2 simple views. In the first one, you will find all your shoes and a \"+\" button that leads to the second view for adding a new shoes to your list.
